about_the_game:
In the shadowed depths of the Kingdom of Liborne, an ancient evil stirs, casting its sinister influence across the land. As a devoted member of the Holy Church, your sacred duty calls you forth. You stand as a beacon of light amidst the encroaching darkness, a warrior of faith tasked with purging the world of the demonic scourge that threatens to engulf it.

Across twelve sprawling maps, each with its own unique style and challenges fight against treacherous foes and formidable bosses, each more fearsome than the last where only the strongest and most courageous souls will emerge victorious.

Will you rise to the challenge and vanquish the darkness that threatens to consume us all? The fate of Liborne hangs in the balance, and only you can determine its ultimate destiny.

  • Hell On Earth: Unleash Your Power Solo or with a Friend
Experience the Hell On Earth campaign, fully playable in solo or co-op mode. Venture alone in the Kingdom of Liborne or team up with a friend to vanquish hordes of enemies. Explore 12 diverse maps, each offering unique challenges, bosses, and enemies. The fate of Liborne lies in your hands!



  • Master the Chaos: Engage in Extreme Dynamic Combat
Stay in the action with our intense, dynamic combat system, where you have full control over your character, attacks, and spells. Nothing is automated, and enemies provide a serious challenge. Masterfully manage your mana and health, dodge enemy attacks, and strike at the perfect moment to triumph over your foes.



  • Shape Your Destiny: A Deeply Customizable Experience
Customize your gameplay experience with our unique leveling system. Each level gained offers a critical choice: select new active spells, passive abilities, or attribute boosts. Every decision shapes your journey, and balancing these choices is essential to overcoming the game's challenges. Your strategy defines your success.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features gameplay elements involving blood and corpses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD HD6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play online. System requirements for this game may change over time.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX560 2G
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play online. System requirements for this game may change over time.

short_description: Immerse yourself in a captivating world where demons have begun to invade the surface of Earth. Join a holy faction as you battle endless hordes of demons, purging them from your infested lands. Venture forth and unravel the mystery behind their overwhelming presence.
